text: Julián Pastor Llaneza (18 October 1943 - 24 August 2015) was a Mexican movie director, actor, screenwriter, editor, and photographer. He was known for directing the movie No One Writes to the Colonel. Pastor was born in Mexico City. Pastor died in Mexico City at the age of 71.Muere el actor y director mexicano Julián Pastor ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Mexican movie directors Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican screenwriters Category:Mexican photographers Category:Writers from Mexico City
title: Julián Pastor
